Detailed Description

Definition at line 16 of file CSettings.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CSettings::CSettings ( stOption *  p_option = NULL  ) 

The CSettings class handles the saving and loading of all the settings that are saved in the game. Those are, video, audio, options and input.

Parameters:
p_option pointer to an array that stores the options settings of the game

Definition at line 24 of file CSettings.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

bool CSettings::saveDrvCfg (  ) 

Write the whole configuration of the settings. Note: See also CConfiguration to understand better the concept of saving...

Returns:
If the configuration has been saved successfully, it return true, else it's false.

Definition at line 36 of file CSettings.cpp.

bool CSettings::loadDrvCfg (  ) 

It loads the whole configuration from the settings file. NOTE: Also take a look at CConfiguration.

Returns:
true if successful, false if not.

Definition at line 81 of file CSettings.cpp.

bool CSettings::loadGameCfg (  ) 

This loads the options of the settings.

Returns:
true if options could be loaded, else false

Definition at line 220 of file CSettings.cpp.

void CSettings::setOption ( e_OptionKeyword  opt,
const std::string &  menuname,
const std::string &  name,
char  value 
)

Sets the option data to the option array.

Parameters:
opt option ID
menuname Name of the option shown in the options menu NOTE: This name may change, depending on what value is set
name Name of the option itself NOTE: This string should be changed, since it names the topic of the applied option
value Value that has to be set.
